author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two days after a four-year-old girl was found raped and murdered in Mankhurd, another four-year-old was found dead in Powai on Wednesday in similar circumstances — both girls went missing on Sunday and were found dead not too far from their residences.

Police said the girl stayed with her parents and had gone missing about 10.45 p.m. on Sunday.
title: Another girl found dead in Mumbai
